description.title: Description
description.default_msg: No description was provided. Please ask the tournament owner to add a description.

rules.title: Rules
rules.default_msg: Regular rules for this sport apply.

max_players.title: Maximum Players
max_players.limit_info: This tournament is limited to {{maxPlayers}} players. There is 1 spot left. Please contact the tournament owner for more information.
max_players.limit_info_plural: This tournament is limited to {{maxPlayers}} players. There are {{spotsLeft}} spots left. Please contact the tournament owner for more information.

tournament.name: Tournament Name
tournament.reward: What are you playing for? (leave blank if no reward)
tournament.timing: When do players typically meet up?
tournament.reward_offered: You may be eligible for prizes throughout this tournament.
